title: Hedge Funds Slash Bullish Silver Wagers to 22-Month Low
description: Money managers slashed their bullish wagers on silver to the lowest in nearly two years before the White House refrained from putting import tariffs on critical minerals that include the white metal.
content: Money managers slashed their bullish wagers on silver to the lowest in nearly two years before the White House refrained from putting import tariffs on critical minerals that include the white metal.
